title: Use PEMDAS
text: We must simplify operations in the following order: parentheses, exponents, $$\frac{multiplication}{division}$$ $$(left-to-right)$$, $$\frac{addition}{subttraction}$$ $$(left-to-right)$$.
speech: We must simplify operations in the following order: parentheses, exponents,  multiplication over division   parentheses, left minus t o minus right  ,  addition over subttraction   parentheses, left minus t o minus right  .
pacedSpeech: We must simplify operations in the following order: parentheses, exponents,   multiplication over division
, left minus t o minus right
, left minus t o minus right

title: Simplifying the Terms
speech: 3 squared minus, fraction, 18 over, 11 minus 5,  is equal to, 3 squared minus 18 sixths, is equal to, 9 minus 18 sixths, is equal to 9 minus 3, is equal to 6
